channel.title: PvPscapez Enjoyment For You Guys
channel.description:
[URL=http://www.pvpscapez.net][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jtvMpG7dQTb31.png[/img][/URL] www.pvpscapez.net direct download http://www.pvpscapez.net/pvpscapez.jar
I switched to 718/742 because alot of people been telling me to. I got great staff and am not looking for staff hunters of any kind. If you join and start complaining and asking for items from either Me or the co owner You will get either muted for 48 hours or jailed. I am trying to Increase my skills in java programming 10x So I am working with this for awhile. Hope to see you ingame I am a nice owner and Very Very active in my server which some people say that its good to be that. Time for some pictures!! At 15 players ima host a clan wars massacre In items on dropped clan wars match! Already started hosting and over 40 accs registered in 30 mins!

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:8, topic:507898”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=626133.msg4260016#msg4260016 date=1363380249]
It appears you have broken the more than one advertisement per server rule, you can view just how many you’ve created by taking a look at this image:

I have locked all of the other threads and will allow this one to stay, however, if you create yet another thread for the same server you will have your posting privileges for this board revoked. Good luck with your server.
[/quote]
STOP MODERATING ME![/quote]
If you stop breaking the rules
